entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ivujivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:18 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -36.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ivujivik Airport 10:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Humidity: 65 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 34. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
